35 void LowLevelControl::CalculateSpeeds(float robotX, float robotY, float robotTheta, float goalX, float goalY, float& lSpeed, float& rSpeed, bool backwards)
36 {
37  float errorX = goalX - robotX;
38  float errorY = goalY - robotY;
39  float distError = sqrt(errorX * errorX + errorY * errorY);
40  float angError = atan2(errorY, errorX) - robotTheta;
41  if (backwards)
42  angError += M_PI;
43  if(angError > M_PI) angError -= 2 * M_PI;
44  if(angError <= -M_PI) angError += 2 * M_PI;
45 
46  if(this->controlType == CTRL_EXPONENTIAL)
47  {
48  //std::cout << "TESTING LOW LEVEL CONTROL: Calculating with exponentials" << std::endl;
49  distError -= 0.7; //Distance to stop in front of a human
50  if(distError < 0) distError = 0;
51  distError = sqrt(distError);
52  float exp_MaxLinear = distError < this->MaxLinear ? distError : this->MaxLinear;
53  if(exp_MaxLinear < 0.1f) exp_MaxLinear = 0.0f;
54  if (fabs(exp_MaxLinear - lastMaxLinear) >= 0.2f)
55  {
56  if(exp_MaxLinear > lastMaxLinear)
57  exp_MaxLinear = lastMaxLinear + 0.1f;
58  else
59  exp_MaxLinear = lastMaxLinear - 0.1f;
60  }
61  lastMaxLinear = exp_MaxLinear;
62  float expTrans = -(angError * angError) / (2 * this->exp_alpha * this->exp_alpha);
63  float vTrans = exp_MaxLinear * exp(expTrans);
64  //Angular component
65  float expRot = (1 + exp(-angError / this->exp_beta));
66  float vAng = this->MaxAngular * (2 / expRot - 1);
67  if (!backwards)
68  {
69  lSpeed = vTrans - this->robotDiam / 2.0f * vAng;
70  rSpeed = vTrans + this->robotDiam / 2.0f * vAng;
71  }
72  else
73  {
74  lSpeed = -vTrans - this->robotDiam / 2.0f * vAng ;
75  rSpeed = -vTrans + this->robotDiam / 2.0f * vAng;
76  }
77  }
78 }
79 
80 void LowLevelControl::CalculateSpeeds(float currentTheta, float goalAngle, float& lSpeed, float& rSpeed)
81 {
82  float angError = goalAngle - currentTheta;
83  if(angError > M_PI) angError -= 2 * M_PI;
84  if(angError <= -M_PI) angError += 2 * M_PI;
85  if (this->controlType == CTRL_EXPONENTIAL)
86  {
87  float expRot = (1 + exp(-angError / (this->exp_beta*0.3f)));
88  float vAng = this->MaxAngular * (2 / expRot - 1);
89  lSpeed = -this->robotDiam / 2.0f * vAng;
90  rSpeed = +this->robotDiam / 2.0f * vAng;
91  }
92 }
93 
94 void LowLevelControl::CalculateSpeeds(float robotX, float robotY, float robotTheta, float goalX, float goalY, float& lSpeed, float& rSpeed)
95 {
96  this->CalculateSpeeds(robotX, robotY, robotTheta, goalX, goalY, lSpeed, rSpeed, false);
97 }
